elements.name: Register a user and register as affiliate with valid and invalid inputs

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
the user clicks on My Account and click on register
the user should see the registration page form
the user enters the following "priya", "ram", "random", "1234567891", "1234" and "1234"
agrees to the Privacy Policy checkbox
submits the registration form  successfully
the user should see "Your Account Has Been Created!" message
the user clicks on continue on register page
the user clicks on register your affiliate information
enters payee name "jeev"
clicks on checkbox based on "yes"
clicks on register continue button

elements.name: Adding a valid comment to the blog

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
the user clicks on the Blog button
the user selects any article from the blog
the user is navigated to the selected blog page

cells: This blog was very informative and well written. Keep it up!

steps.name: the user enters the following comment details:
the user clicks on the Post Comment button
the user should see the message "Thank you for your comment. It has been submitted to the webmaster for approval."

elements.name: Estimate the shipping and taxes

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
the user clicks on My Account and selects login
the user enters valid credentials
the user clicks on the Login button
the user clicks on the Shopping Cart
the user clicks the Edit Cart button
the user clicks the Estimate Shipping and Taxes button
the user enters the required shipping details
the user clicks the Get Quotes button
the user selects Flat Shipping Rate and clicks Apply Shipping button
the user should see message "Success: Your shipping estimate has been applied!"

elements.name: Estimate shipping with empty fields

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
the user clicks on My Account and selects login
the user enters valid credentials
the user clicks on the Login button
the user clicks on the Shopping Cart
the user clicks the Edit Cart button
the user clicks the Estimate Shipping and Taxes button
the user leaves the shipping details empty
the user clicks the Get Quotes button
the user should see error message "Please select a region / state!"

user clicks on Forgotten Password link
user enters "2k21eee65@kiot.ac.in" to receive reset link
user clicks continue
user should a message "An email with a confirmation link has been sent your email address."

elements.name: User chooses Apple from main menu

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
user clicks on the main menu
clicks on apple option
the user should see products from apple

elements.name: Submit a valid product review with rating and comment

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
user clicks the Phones & PDAs category
user selects the iPod Nano product
user is on the product review section
user enters "soundar" in the Name field
user writes "Excellent product with great features" in the Review field
user selects a 5-star rating
user clicks on the Continue button to submit the review
success message "Thank you for your review. It has been submitted to the webmaster for approval." should be displayed

elements.name: Submit review without rating and without comment

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
user clicks the Phones & PDAs category
user selects the iPod Nano product
user is on the product review section
user enters "soundar" in the Name field
user leaves the Review field blank
user does not select any rating
user clicks on the Continue button to submit the review
error message "Please select a review rating" should be displayed

elements.name: Submit review with rating but without comment

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
user clicks the Phones & PDAs category
user selects the iPod Nano product
user is on the product review section
user enters "soundar" in the Name field
user leaves the Review field blank
user selects a 4-star rating
user clicks on the Continue button to submit the review
error message "Warning: Review Text must be between 25 and 1000 characters!" should be displayed

description: I want to register for the ecommerce LambdaTest account

elements.name: Register with valid inputs

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
the user clicks on My Account.
clicks the register button
the user enters "priya", "ram", "", "1234567891", "1234" and "1234"
agrees to the Privacy Policy
submits the registration form
the user should see "Your Account Has Been Created!"

elements.name: Register with invalid inputs

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
the user clicks on My Account.
clicks the register button
the user enters invalid "", "ram", "priya123@gmail.com", "1234567891", "1234" and "1234"
agrees to the Privacy Policy
submits the registration form
the user should see "First Name must be between 1 and 32 characters!" for "empty first name"

elements.name: Register with invalid inputs

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
the user clicks on My Account.
clicks the register button
the user enters invalid "priya", "ram", "oign@gma.com", "1234567891", "1234" and "1234"
agrees to the Privacy Policy
submits the registration form
the user should see "Warning: E-Mail Address is already registered!" for "existing email"

elements.name: Register with invalid inputs

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
the user clicks on My Account.
clicks the register button
the user enters invalid "priya", "ram", "priya123@gmail.com", "1234567891", "" and "1234"
agrees to the Privacy Policy
submits the registration form
the user should see "Password must be between 4 and 20 characters!" for "empty password"

elements.name: Register with invalid inputs

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
the user clicks on My Account.
clicks the register button
the user enters invalid "priya", "ram", "priya123@gmail.com", "1234567891", "1234" and "4321"
agrees to the Privacy Policy
submits the registration form
the user should see "Password confirmation does not match password!" for "password mismatch"

elements.name: Register with +valid inputs  with out checking privacy policy

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
the user clicks on My Account.
clicks the register button
the user enters "priya", "ram", "priya123@gmail.com", "1234567891", "1234" and "1234"
submits the registration form
the user should see "Warning: You must agree to the Privacy Policy!" for "Not checking privacy policy"

clicks on designs option

elements.name: Add a single product to the cart

steps.name: the user is on homepage
user clicks the Phones & PDAs category
user selects the iPod Nano product
user clicks on the Add to Cart button
user should see a confirmation message stating "Success: You have added iPod Nano to your shopping cart!"

elements.name: Remove a product from the cart

steps.name: the user is on homepage
user clicks the Phones & PDAs category
user selects the iPod Nano product
user clicks on the Add to Cart button
user views the shopping cart
user removes iPod Nano from the cart
the shopping cart should display "Your shopping cart is empty!"

elements.name: User tries to add a product to cart without selecting size

steps.name: the user is on homepage
user clicks the Phones & PDAs category
user selects the Apple Cinema 30 product
user clicks on the Add to Cart button
user should see a message "Size required!"

elements.name: Edit user account details

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
the user clicks on My Account and selects login
the user enters valid credentials
the user clicks on the Login button
the user clicks the "Edit your account information" page
the user updates telephone number
clicks on the "EditInfo" Continue button
user should see "Success: Your account has been successfully updated."

elements.name: Change user password

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
the user clicks on My Account and selects login
the user enters valid credentials
the user clicks on the Login button
the user clicks the Change your password page
the user enters current password and new password details
clicks on the "ChangePassword" Continue button
user should see "Success: Your password has been successfully updated."

elements.name: Change user password without providing new password

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
the user clicks on My Account and selects login
the user enters valid credentials
the user clicks on the Login button
the user clicks the Change your password page
clicks on the "ChangePassword" Continue button
user should see the "Password must be between 4 and 20 characters!"
